name: diet patch today
short_description: A protein that helps burn fat This protein appears to be effective in reducing the risk of heart  disease and also reduce fat for weight loss. This patch uses the power of seaweed, increase fat burning in the area of applied  and thus helps in reducing weight.If you take the weight loss pill or use a different method does not work well for you then this patch can help you get what you want. How Diet patch working? The seaweed is used in this patch called Bladderwrack, Algae is rich in minerals and vitamins A, B, C, D, E and K and proteins that help fight free radicals and remove excess fat  from the skin..
